ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of SONIA ANNE-MARIE INGRID GAAL of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time Vice-Chairperson of the Military Grievances External Review Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective February 1, 2014.
